Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product is not just an item, but a testament to quality and craftsmanship. Given its exceptional nature, I believe it's worth more than $100 to you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $150. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you have any questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
